Please attach your config.ini file you are launching with.  It seems like the osgi.bundles property does not include the new split runtime bundles.  How did you install the build.  Did you update from an update site, or unzip over an existing install, or unzip into a clean directory?

config.ini:

-vmargs
-Xms40m
-Xmx256m

I simply extracted the zip to a new directory, is this problem unique to my case?
As Tom suspected, the content of the config.ini does not reference the new runtime plug-ins.  Note that the build id though.  Not sure how this old configi.ini made it into the build.
I just downloaded the build and it has the correct config.ini.  Are you using launching eclipse with an old configuration?
I redownloaded the build and everything seems to be working fine now.  Sorry for the confusion and false alert, i'm not sure how it came to be.
